AND TO_CHAR(A.CREAT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN #{strStartDt} AND #{strEndDt}

SELECT A.SERVER_ID, A.SERVER_EQPMN_ID, A.LOG_ID, C.SERVER_EQPMN_NM AS SERVER_NM, C.SERVER_EQPMN_IP, A.CPU_USE_RT, A.MORY_USE_RT, A.SVC_STTUS, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM072' AND CODE = A.SVC_STTUS) AS SVC_STTUS_NM, A.LOG_INFO, C.MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES, TO_CHAR(A.CREAT_DT, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') AS CREAT_DT, TO_CHAR(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') AS FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, TO_CHAR(A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') AS LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTNSERVERRESRCELOGINFO A, COMTNSERVERINFO B, COMTNSERVEREQPMNINFO C WHERE A.SERVER_ID = B.SERVER_ID AND A.SERVER_EQPMN_ID = C.SERVER_EQPMN_ID AND A.LOG_ID = #{logId}
